category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Performance Tuning
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PortalDesignContextAlwaysResetFilterConfigurationPanel
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the third window is always reset when transitioning from the second window of Design Context. Valid Values: TRUE - The third window is always reset when transitioning from the second window. FALSE - The third window is not reset when transitioning from the second window.
